column1: # This file lists for each language code the name under which the language
# and its variants are known to the Microsoft SDK (LANG_* and SUBLANG_*_*).
# E.g. for "en" this allows to produce MAKELANGID(LANG_ENGLISH, SUBLANG_NEUTRAL)
# The language order is the same as will be used for generating translations_txt.c
# (changing it will thus generate a huge changeset)

column3: # keep default language on first line
